definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: Residential carpenters erect all types of homes, including apartments and townhouses.
sentences.chinese: 住宅木匠会建造各式各样的房屋，例如公寓和市政厅。

sentences.english: I was having lunch with Galt at a French restaurant near her apartment in Chelsea.
sentences.chinese: 我们在高特切尔西区公寓附近的法国餐馆吃饭。

sentences.english: Yes, we have a two-room apartment free after the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 对，这个周末以后我们可以腾出一套两居室的公寓。

sentences.english: He was snapped making sure the windows were sparkling by a resident in a neighbouring apartment block.
sentences.chinese: 他烦恼一定是邻近公寓楼的住户让窗玻璃发出闪光。

sentences.english: When would you say that there would be an apartment available again?
sentences.chinese: 你会如何去说当又有一间公寓可出租呢？

sentences.english: After her funeral, I returned to her apartment with my family and friends.
sentences.chinese: 在她的葬礼后，我和家人朋友回到她的公寓。

sentences.english: Space is at a premium in a one-bedroomed apartment.
sentences.chinese: 单居室公寓的空间是很有限的。

sentences.english: He has a comfortable apartment in a high-rise building in the business center of the city.
sentences.chinese: 他在市商业中心一幢高层建筑里有一套舒适的公寓。

sentences.english: Cardboard boxes for the tenements, doors and windows painstankingly detailed with coloured pens.
sentences.chinese: 用水彩笔描绘的纸板箱是用来装公寓，大门和窗户的。

sentences.english: Teacher in charge of a school boardinghouse .
Called Dreaming Roma B&B, it was a 4-roomed apartment.
sentences.chinese: 其实是一个楼里的有4间屋子的公寓。

sentences.english: Does your apartment have a gym onsite?
sentences.chinese: 你的公寓内有健身房吗？

sentences.english: The security guard of the apartment did not enter the Visa Office of the South Korean Embassy.
sentences.chinese: 公寓保安人员没有进入韩国驻华使馆领事部。

sentences.english: Back in her own flat, the teacher of English prepared for bed.
sentences.chinese: 英语教师回到自己的公寓后就准备就寝。

sentences.english: Zhang Hua quickly ran back to his flat and poured water over his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 张华迅速的跑回他的公寓，并用水弄湿他的夹克。

sentences.english: Do you need a furnished or unfurnished apartment?
sentences.chinese: 你需要带家具还是不带家具的公寓？
